short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Software were you can see and copy all color codes for HTML

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: HTML helper is used by HTML developers for notes and color codes. This extension is helpful to developers because either you memorized all color codes or you have or you printed them all out. This is a non-hassle way to get color codes and have notes for future projects.
